00051 /**
00052  * @brief Constructor. Registers the objects we know how to create and how
00053  * they describe themselves.
00054  */
00055 ChipStreamFactory::ChipStreamFactory() {
00056   // 
00057   m_WriteSketchGroup_a5=NULL;
00058 
00059   // RmaBgTran
00060   m_Docs.push_back(RmaBgTran::explainSelf());
00061   m_Creators.push_back(&RmaBgTran::newObject);
00062 
00063   // Quantile Normalization
00064   m_Docs.push_back(SketchQuantNormTran::explainSelf());
00065   m_Creators.push_back(&SketchQuantNormTran::newObject);
00066 
00067   // Generic Transformation
00068   m_Docs.push_back(ArtifactReduction::explainSelf());
00069   m_Creators.push_back(&ArtifactReduction::newObject);
00070 
00071   // Median Normalization
00072   m_Docs.push_back(MedNormTran::explainSelf());
00073   m_Creators.push_back(&MedNormTran::newObject);
00074 
00075   // AdapterType Normalization
00076   m_Docs.push_back(AdapterTypeNormTran::explainSelf());
00077   m_Creators.push_back(&AdapterTypeNormTran::newObject);
00078 
00079   // GcBg
00080   m_Docs.push_back(GcBg::explainSelf());
00081   m_Creators.push_back(&GcBg::newObject);
00082 
00083   // GcCorrection
00084   m_Docs.push_back(GcCorrection::explainSelf());
00085   m_Creators.push_back(&GcCorrection::newObject);
00086 
00087   // ScaleIntensity
00088   m_Docs.push_back(ScaleIntensities::explainSelf());
00089   m_Creators.push_back(&ScaleIntensities::newObject);
00090 
00091   // IntensityReporter
00092   m_Docs.push_back(IntensityReporter::explainSelf());
00093   m_Creators.push_back(&IntensityReporter::newObject);
00094 
00095   // ChipStream -- placeholder chipstream that does no tranformations
00096   m_Docs.push_back(ChipStream::explainSelf());
00097   m_Creators.push_back(&ChipStream::newObject);
00098 
00099   m_uiCelFileCount = 0;
00100   m_WriteProfileGroup_a5 = NULL;
00101 }

00103 /**
00104  * @brief Create a pointer to a new ChipStream object as described
00105  * in the string specification.
00106  * @param spec - Specification string i.e. quant-norm.sketch=1000000
00107  *
00108  * @return Pointer to new ChipStream objects, must be deleted when
00109  * finished.
00110  */
00111 ChipStream *ChipStreamFactory::cStreamForString(const std::string &spec) {
00112   ChipStream *stream = NULL;
00113   SelfCreate *create = NULL;
00114   create = SelfCreate::selfCreateFromString(spec, m_Docs, m_Creators, "ChipStream");
00115   /* Check class type. */
00116   if(InstanceOf(create, ChipStream)) {
00117     stream = static_cast<ChipStream *>(create);
00118   }
00119   else {
00120     Err::errAbort("Class doesn't appear to be of type ChipStream.");
00121   }
00122   return stream;
00123 }

00125 /**
00126  * @brief Factory for making ChipStreams from a string description.
00127  *
00128  * @param spec - Specification in form "chipstream.key=value.key=value"
00129  * @param layout - Probe and probe set info.
00130  * @param description - name of chipstream path so far.
00131  * @return ChipStream requested.
00132  */
00133 ChipStream *ChipStreamFactory::chipStreamForString(const std::string &spec, 
00134                                                    ChipLayout &layout,
00135                                                    const std::string &description) {
00136   ChipStreamFactory factory;
00137   ChipStream *stream = NULL;
00138 
00139   stream = cStreamForString(spec);
00140   assert(stream);
00141   int pmSize = layout.getPmProbeMask().size();
00142 //   if(pmSize == 0)
00143 //     Err::errAbort("ChipStreamFactory::chipStreamForString() - Must have some perfect match probes on chip.");
00144   vector<bool> pmProbes(pmSize);
00145   vector<vector<float> > probes;
00146   Verbose::out(2, ToStr("Made ChipStream of type: ") + ToStr(stream->getType()));
00147   /* Some ChipStream specific operations. */
00148   if(InstanceOf(stream, RmaBgTran)) {
00149     static_cast<RmaBgTran *>(stream)->setPmProbes(layout.getPmProbeMask());
00150   }
00151   if(InstanceOf(stream, MedNormTran)) {
00152     MedNormTran *s = static_cast<MedNormTran *>(stream);
00153     if(!m_NormProbes.empty()) {
00154       vector<bool> subset(layout.getProbeCount(), false);
00155       for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_NormProbes.size(); i++)
00156         subset[m_NormProbes[i]] = true;
00157       s->setSubProbes(subset);
00158     }
00159   }
00160   if (InstanceOf(stream, AdapterTypeNormTran)) 
00161   {
00162     AdapterTypeNormTran *s = static_cast<AdapterTypeNormTran *>(stream);
00163         s->setup(m_strAnnotationFileName, &layout, m_uiCelFileCount);
00164   }
00165   if(InstanceOf(stream, SketchQuantNormTran)) {
00166     SketchQuantNormTran *s = static_cast<SketchQuantNormTran *>(stream);
00167     s->setProbeCount(layout.getProbeCount());
00168     /* Do we have a specific sketch we are normalizing to? */
00169     if(m_TargetSketch.size() > 0) {
00170       s->setTargetSketch(m_TargetSketch);
00171     }
00172     /* Set pm probes if using them for normalization. */
00173     if(s->getUsePmSubset()) {
00174       s->setSubProbes(layout.getPmProbeMask());
00175     }
00176     /* Else if we have another specific subset use that. */
00177     else {
00178       if(!m_NormProbes.empty()) {
00179         vector<bool> subset(layout.getProbeCount(), false);
00180         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_NormProbes.size(); i++)
00181           subset[m_NormProbes[i]] = true;
00182         s->setSubProbes(subset);
00183       }
00184     }
00185     if(!m_WriteSketchDir.empty()) {
00186       string outFile = Fs::join(m_WriteSketchDir,description + s->getType() +".normalization-target.txt");
00187       s->saveTargetSketch(outFile);
00188     }
00189     if(!m_WriteSketchDir_a5.empty()) {
00190       string outFile = Fs::join(m_WriteSketchDir_a5,description + s->getType()+".normalization-target.a5");
00191       s->saveTargetSketch_a5(outFile);
00192     }
00193     if (m_WriteSketchGroup_a5!=NULL) {
00194       s->saveTargetSketch_group_a5(m_WriteSketchGroup_a5);
00195     }
00196 
00197   }
00198 // Generic data: boy this is too complex 
00199     if(InstanceOf(stream, ArtifactReduction)) {
00200     ArtifactReduction *s = static_cast<ArtifactReduction *>(stream);
00201     
00202     // only sets up file names for i/o
00203     // 
00204     // reading from somewhere, pass filename down into the ArtifactReduction object
00205     if (!m_ReadProfile.empty()){
00206             s->setreadReferenceProfile(m_ReadProfile);
00207         }
00208    
00209     if(!m_WriteProfileDir.empty()) {
00210       string outFile = m_WriteProfileDir + description + s->getType() + ToStr(".generic-target.txt");
00211       s->saveReferenceProfile(outFile);
00212     }
00213 
00214     // make the object aware of structure
00215     s->AddLayout(&layout);
00216 
00217     // pass layout to object if needed
00218         // look to other methods
00219 
00220 
00221     
00222     /*if(!m_WriteProfileDir_a5.empty()) {
00223       string outFile = m_WriteProfileDir_a5 + description + s->getType() + ToStr(".generic-target.a5");
00224       s->saveReferenceProfile_a5(outFile);
00225     }
00226     if (m_WriteProfileGroup_a5!=NULL) {
00227       s->saveReferenceProfile_group_a5(m_WriteReferenceProfileGroup_a5);
00228       }*/
00229 
00230   }
00231 // end generic data
00232     
00233   if(InstanceOf(stream, GcBg)) {
00234     if(m_GcControlProbes.empty()) {
00235       Err::errAbort("chipStreamForString() - Must set control probes to make GcBg Chipstream object.");
00236     }
00237     GcBg *gcbg = static_cast<GcBg *>(stream);
00238     gcbg->setControlProbes(m_GcControlProbes);
00239     gcbg->setProbeGcVec(layout.getGcProbeVec());
00240   }
00241 
00242   if(InstanceOf(stream, GcCorrection)) {
00243     GcCorrection *gccorrection = static_cast<GcCorrection *>(stream);
00244     gccorrection->setProbeGcVec(layout.getGcProbeVec(),&layout);
00245   }
00246 
00247   if(InstanceOf(stream, ScaleIntensities)) 
00248   {
00249           ScaleIntensities *scale = static_cast<ScaleIntensities *>(stream);
00250           scale->setChipLayout (&layout);
00251   }
00252 
00253 
00254 
00255   return stream;
00256 }

00258 ChipStream *ChipStreamFactory::chipStreamForStringBoard(PsBoard &board,
00259                                                         const std::string &spec, 
00260                                                         const std::string &description) {
00261   ChipStreamFactory factory;
00262   ChipStream *stream = NULL;
00263 
00264   stream = cStreamForString(spec);
00265   assert(stream);
00266   //int pmSize = board.getProbeInfo()->getProbeCount();
00267   Verbose::out(2, ToStr("Made ChipStream of type: ") + ToStr(stream->getType()));
00268   stream->setParameters(board);
00269   return stream;
00270 }

00272 void ChipStreamFactory::readNormProbesFromFile(const std::string& fileName) {
00273   TsvFile tsv;
00274   vector<int> probeIds;
00275   int id;
00276 
00277   if(tsv.open(fileName) != TSV_OK) {
00278     Err::errAbort("Couldn't open '" + fileName + "' to read.");
00279   }
00280   tsv.bind(0, "probe_id", &id, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00281   while(tsv.nextLevel(0) == TSV_OK) {
00282     probeIds.push_back(TO_ZEROBASED(id));
00283   }
00284   setProbesForNorm(probeIds);
00285   tsv.close();
00286 }

00288 /**
00289  * Open and read a target distribution from a text file. Must have a column
00290  * called 'intensities' with distribution quantiles sorted from highest to
00291  * lowest.
00292  *
00293  * @param fileName - text file containing column of quantiles.
00294  */
00295 void ChipStreamFactory::readTargetSketchFromFile(const std::string& fileName) {
00296   SketchQuantNormTran::readTargetSketchFromFile(fileName, m_TargetSketch);
00297 }
00298 
00299 void ChipStreamFactory::readTargetSketchFromFile_a5(const std::string& fileName) {
00300   affx::File5_File* file5=new affx::File5_File();
00301   file5->open(fileName,affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00302   
00303   readTargetSketchFromFile_a5_tsv(file5,"target-sketch");
00304   
00305   file5->close();
00306   delete file5;
00307 }
00308   
00309 void ChipStreamFactory::readTargetSketchFromFile_a5_tsv(affx::File5_Group* group5,
00310                                                         const std::string& name)
00311 {
00312   //printf("### reading A5 sketch from: '%s'\n",name.c_str());
00313   double intensity;
00314   affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5=group5->openTsv("target-sketch",affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00315 
00316   m_TargetSketch.clear();
00317   while (tsv5->nextLine()==affx::FILE5_OK) {
00318     tsv5->get(0,0,&intensity);
00319     m_TargetSketch.push_back(intensity);
00320   }
00321   //
00322   tsv5->close();
00323   delete tsv5;
00324 }
00325 
00326 bool ChipStreamFactory::canBuild(const std::string &spec) {
00327   return SelfCreate::canMake(spec, m_Docs);
00328 }
